name: Shirt Darina
recommendations: For durability and brightness, hand wash the shirt at 30-40 degrees, avoiding the use of a washing machine. After washing, gently shake off the water without wringing it out, and dry it on a flat surface, avoiding prolonged exposure to sunlight. When ironing the embroidered shirt, use gauze or fabric to protect the product from damage.
description: Beautiful shirt Darina with embroidery that adds a unique national touch to your look.
